definition[0]: a piece of outer clothing worn by women and girls, which hangs down from the waist like the bottom part of a dress
example[0]: She wore a white blouse and a plain black skirt.
example[2]: a short skirt and high heels
definition[1]: the part of a dress or coat that hangs down from the waist
definition[2]: to go around the outside edge of a place or area
example[3]: The old footpath skirts around the village.
definition[3]: to avoid talking about an important subject, especially because it is difficult or embarrassing â€“ used to show disapproval
example[4]: a disappointing speech that skirted around all the main issues
